Player History
Injured on 4/2/1967 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/12/1967 with a Broken Finger, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 9/5/1967 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to Los Angeles on 6/23/1968 (Going to LA: P R. Wise, RF B. Trevino. Going to NYY: 2B B. Fenwick)...
Injured on 7/28/1968 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1969, off Juan Marichal (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1969, off Jack Billingham (ATL)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Injured on 5/21/1973 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 10/3/1973 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
